name: Joni Williams
text:
Dr Black has changed my life !!! I highly recommend him. His staff is also great. I have never had a Dr to come in ,sit down & talk with me like he does. He explains everything so that I understand. I'm 3 months out & have lost 61 lbs !!!
Thank you Dr Black !!!

name: Amy Jenkins
text: Please do not pay any attention to the 1 star reviews. Dr. Black is precious! He shoots you the truth and gives you information to make your surgery decision a successful one. I’m sure over the years, after giving his patients the keys to losing all the weight and keeping it off, he’s seen a few of them come back in with weight gain, knowing they didn’t follow their diet. That can be frustrating, knowing that the surgery is a serious one. He wants his patients to be successful. He was so kind to my daughter while I was in recovery. He explained everything thoroughly to her as to what went on and what to expect. The ENTIRE staff at his office was wonderful and the ENTIRE staff at Stringfellow hospital was wonderful as well.

name: Randy Chaffin
text:
Excellent surgeon and doctor, highly recommended!
I’m two years a patient of Anniston General Surgery and had the gastric sleeve. Dr Black and staff clearly explain the surgery and steps for patient success in easy to understand terms, and provide excellent advice and support in aftercare. If you’re considering affordable bariatric surgery to battle morbid obesity you won’t find a better place.

name: Brandi Holloway
text:
So Thankful for Dr. Black and his awesome staff!! I had been dealing with servere acid reflux for years!! Dr. Black evaluated and found a small hernia, we then set up surgery. Since my procedure I've had NO ACID REFLUX!! I also was blessed to loose nearly 40 pounds after my procedure!! Not only did he did my acid reflux, I was able to loose weight and I feel 100 times better!! Thank you Dr. Black and your Amazing staff!!
~B. Holloway

name: Allen Cummings
text: I want to give Dr Black and staff 👍👍, Dr Black us an awesome surgeon, his staff is awesome. My sleeve surgery went off without any complications and with very minimal pain. I would suggest Dr.Black to anyone thinking of bariatric surgery.

name: Cas Kopczyk
text:
I apologize now for a long review but it's important to know the doctor your dealing with. As for Dr.Black, it was a life changing event for me finding him to repair my hiatal hernia with the Nissan Fundoplication surgical procedure. I had severe heart burn for over 30 years, 30 years. I was on Protonix all that time because my current insurance said I was doing fine with it. I turned 65 and got Humana Ins. They covered it. Yah! Humana!
I started out with a specialist from Carrollton whom I was referred to and I listened without any research, bad move. That joker wanted to do stomach bypass surgery. I'm 6ft. and weigh 247lbs, big but not extreme, according to Dr.Black, thank God. I went through testing in Carrollton that was stretched out over 4 months last summer to then be told forget the Nissan, he refused to do it. That's when I decided to do my own research, daa! I found one of the best Nissan procedure doctors on this side of the country right here in Anniston Alabama, Dr.Black. In 1 1/2 weeks he ran test, did the operation and changed my life. He's retired military and don't mess around, a straight laced guy. He said, follow my instructions all will go great. I'm no buddy's fool. I listened. This doctor is the only way to go for mine and other types of surgeries.
Dr.Black, your the BEST and THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!

name: Lacey Rice
text: I have used Dr Black on three different occasions. The last was for gastric sleeve. He is so rude and really treated me badly. He will not listen to you and has zero compassion. Ive never had a doctor ever raise their voice or talk down to me as he did. Ive lost all respect for Dr. Black. Do not use this doctor. Find another who will be supportive in your journey. You will be glad you did!

name: Michelle Marie
text: Dr. Black doesn't put up with no BS. If you are there to truly get help, he will help you. He doesn't want to waste anyone's time. His staff is amazing! He's done two surgeries for me and I would reccomend him to everyone!

name: Nick Hartman
text: Don't listen to the one star reviews.  Doctor Black is a great doctor and I have been nothing but happy with him.  I have been to Doctor Black a couple times so I have a couple more data plots than most patience.

name: Cathy Magill
text: My husband has had platinum level treatment with weight loss surgery.  When he had digestive issues post op, he would call Dr. Black's office and they would call back the same day.  Often, it was Dr. Black calling back with a solution that addressed my husband's immediate needs!!!!!!  How many doctors do that?.  He has a God given talent and we have been blessed using him as a surgeon.

name: Bama Momof1
text: Dr. Black is a awesome Dr . Dr Black will take the time to talk with you , answer your question's .He will not rush you out the door like some do . His staff is super nice and will take time to answer your questions if you have any .

name: joevgirl 4_ever
text:
Excellent doctor. Listens and saved my life recently.
Highly recommend!

name: Joy Thompson
text: Dr. Black is kind and caring he does not sugarcoat the problem. He has a wonderful staff.

name: Rue Chatfield
text: He did an amazing job with all my issues

name: Frankie Waters
text: Dr. Clifford black is a foul mouthed rude person. He has no beside manner and compassion for anyone. I don't recommend anyone going to him.

name: Michelle Baker
text: Wonderful staff and surgeon

name: Kelly Nelson
text: Naples, FL office at NCH. Run as fast as you can from this doc. If I could give her a -0 score, I would. She put a device in my breast (Biozorb) without my knowledge or my consent and my body rejected it. After fighting to beat cancer, I suffered through 18 months of pure hell because of this device! They were actually planning a bone marrow transplant until my oncologist realized this device was causing every symptom. I had her remove the device (which I didn't need anyway $$$) and she still left pieces of metal in my breast and left me very deformed. I now have to pay for yet another surgery to get out what she was never supposed to put in me anyway. She violated my trust in her and made me pay the price. I've never left a bad review for a doctor but I don't want anyone else to go thru what I did. Cancer treatment was hard enough, she put me thru more hell than any treatment I went thru for stage 3c breast cancer.

name: Rita Robinett
text:
I went to him for severe back pain but I saw his practitioner nurse.  She showed me my MRI film but they weren't mine. I have seen mine and much worse  than that.They passed me off to his Associate Dr. Harmon saying Hadley didn't do the kind of surgery I needed so I had to go again an hour away. He said he couldn't help me. They are using other films and flat out lying to patients.  My Brother has treated the same way. These Drs.. Only want your money and don't care if us older people suffer and die. They never mentioned any other options which I now
Know is out t
there.  They all should be reported.

name: Michellemd McElroy
text: Dr Hadley,(and his team) has changed my life with his skills more than once. Three times actually. He's the only neurosurgeon I'd recommend, a true miracle worker! His team is truly amazing.

name: Don Jackson
text: I had back pain for 11 years.  Dr. Hadley did my surgery in July 2020 and I'm almost pain free.  I'd give him more stars if I could, he deserves more than just 5.  His staff is amazing and he treated me wonderfully.  It's amazing to finally feel great.  I had a fusion done and that's a serious surgery but I knew I was in great hands.  I had tremendous confidence all the way.  I highly recommend Dr. Hadley for spinal issues.  He is the best in his field!!!

name: Mark Nunnelly
text: I have been blessed to be under the care of Dr. Hadley for the past 3.5 years.  He recently performed a laminectomy on 3 of my vertebrae because of a spinal cord tumor and I am recovering well.  Since my first meeting with Dr. Hadley, I have been confident that Dr. Hadley was the best of the best regarding his skills and knowledge.  My recent surgery results proved that to be true.   I would recommend him to anyone that asks.  Thank you Dr. Hadley!

name: Teresa Leatherwood Leatherwood
text: I meet With Dr Hadley and David and They went over my mri and Talk about What They could do for me To give me some Relief and get my strength Back we decided Neck  surgury wood be The Thing To do and They were  great when i went Back and we Talk about what They wood be doing and They Explain everything To where i could understand and They Took Time with me and They were verry caring and concerned about my pain and what i hade been dealing with for 5 years i wish i could have found Them long Time ago i loved how Dr Hadley gives god all The praise That He knows and Recognized That. There  gift is from God Thats what put me at so much. at. ease  knowing He belives in our lord. I wood   give him and David more Then 5 stars if i could i Wood Recommend. Praise God Just still have little hard Time swallowing from The surgury but im improving  with That each day That go By. My surgury was  april The 20th

name: Amy Petersen
text: I cannot describe in a single review what a truly exemplary surgeon, diagnostician, healer, and human Dr. Hadley is. I have had 3 surgeries on my cervical spine so far. I wish I had gone to Dr. Hadley from the start and perhaps that number would be only one. I work in healthcare and was desperate for help. I surveyed my peers for some time across many levels and many modalities. The recommendation was unanimous. Dr. Hadley took the time to have a certain, clear diagnosis before he considered surgery. Surgical intervention with him and his entire team was exactly how they described and the outcome far exceeded my hopes. Dr. Hadley went above and beyond to help me get care from a specialist in a different modality when the pandemic made getting health services challenging. My affection and gratitude for what he has given to me and my family is profound.

name: Joshua Carter
text: World Class Care! Dr Hadley and his team gave me another chance at a pain free life. Truly a life changing experience. Dr Hadley, Ms Linda, and David Thank You!

name: Howard Bailey
text:
I went to Dr. Hadley after 2 surgeries in 2020 had left me in worse shape than I was before. The surgery that caused the real issue was a very sloppy fusion surgery that was performed, by an inferior surgeon, in July. When Dr. Hadley went in on November the 6th, he found 3 of the 6 screws either backing out or lose. He removed all of the existing hardware and did a fusion form L2 to S1. I feel better today than I did on any day of 2020. If you compare the post op CT scans of the first and second fusion, the first one looks like it was performed by a shop teacher whereas Dr. Hadley's work is perfectly symmetrical, the screw placement is exact with each one going in at the exact same angle and right in the middle if each vertebrae.

After my first fusion left me in terrible pain that surgeon referred me out to a pain management clinic saying there was nothing more that could be done. I am so thankful that I cancelled that appointment and went looking for a referral to get a second opinion. I am not sure how I lucked into Dr. Haley's office but I am very grateful that I did. Because today I was released by Dr. Hadley with no further PT required. I am at work and capable of providing for and enjoying my family instead of numbed out on opiods for the rest of my life.

Thank you Dr. Hadley

name: beth sisco
text:
After going to the doctor thinking I had a simple pinched nerve, and finding out I had a severely herniated disc that had obviously been there for quite some time. The orthopedic i saw wanted me in surgery immediately and put me in bedrest until such time that I could have surgery. He also hinted that I may be facing multiple back surgeries. Knowing the complexity of back surgery I chose to seek a second opinion by a neurosurgeon. After several days of research I decided to see Dr. Hadley. At our first meeting he was very caring and explained the severity of my herniation. He calmed our worries that I would need multiple surgeries. He ordered a few tests to determine the severity of the damage done by the herniation and we scheduled surgery. His office worked extensively with us and the Red Cross to get our son home to help me after my surgery, and they have asked each time they have seen me about my son.

The surgery process was as painless as possible, and the fact that I saw Dr. Hadley on Saturday morning in the hospital before I went home warmed my heart. I can honestly say that Dr. Hadley is one of the few doctors that I have had the pleasure of being a patient of. He has truly been a blessing to my family, and two and a half weeks after surgery I can happily say that I feel great, have started going back to work, and feel like I have a new lease on life. I can't thank him and his staff enough for the care they have given me, and look forward to him being able to help those that I love.

name: Doyn Epperson
text: The first time I meet Doctor Hadely he said he reviewed my MRI’s that were sent and said your here because God brought us together. God knew you needed help and God has gifted/given me the ability to help people with your type back problems.  Then he explained in detail what needed to be done. I had the surgery on L1; L2; L3 & 4 vertebrate -8 screws and 2 rods. It’s been 3 months now and I feel great. No pain in my legs feeling back in my feet and no pain in my lower back. God Bless and Keep watch over Doctor Hadley.  Almost forgot to mention he prayes for God Guidance before surgery to help the patient he operates on. Thank God for bringing Doctor Hadley and me together.

name: Kelli Peek
text: I was referred to Dr. Hadley by a neurologist.  She had me thinking that I was about to undergo multiple back surgeries.  On my first visit, he took the time to review all of my images - one at a time. Although I had herniations, he explained thoroughly why surgery wasn't necessary at that time. I was also having some facial, arm, and hand numbness, tingling, and pain. After ruling out surgery wasn't necessary for my back at this time, he didn't stop trying to help me find answers for my pain. He referred me to other specialists at UAB and ordered other tests. He continues to help me find answers and shows compassion in every turn we take. I am so grateful to have found him and have more hope in the few months I've known him than I've had in over a year!

name: Wallace Hannon
text:
I had 3 fusions in lower back two years ago. I was having unbearable pain and usually not able to walk. Now I have pain on the average of 2.5 months and I know what helps and why I have the flare ups. Other specialists had agreed to 'keep me comfortable. I do have some of my life back and owe Dr, Hadley,
Thank you bless you. I'm 75 now and getting around with caution.
He is the BEST.

name: Roger Moore
text: Amazing Surgeon, Linda and David are amazing also, he took it personal to see my well being and what was best for me. Highly recommend him and his staff.

name: Linda Evans
text: Dr. Hadley, and staff were a life saver for me. They solved my issues that I had been suffering from for several years. I would highly recommend Dr Hadley, and his staff at Kirkland Clinic (UAB of Alabama) to anyone.

name: David Brown
text: From my initial visit to the post surgical visit, the professionalism, confidence, and caring bedside manner to me and my family from Dr. Hadley went beyond any of my expectations.  Dr. Hadley and his team diagnosed my issue, and had me try other non-surgical options before ultimately recommending surgery to address my back/leg pain.  The procedure was discussed, and every question or concern I had was addressed in the consultation before surgery.  It made the decision to move forward with the procedure an easy one.  I am now 5 weeks out of surgery, and have not had leg pain since prior to surgery.  I could not have asked for better results.

name: Nancy Jordan
text: I am so thankful to have been under Dr. Hadley's care as my neorosurgeon.  I had been enduring pain from my hip to my ankle for a long time.  I was told he was the best and through my experience from pre-testing and consultation through surgery and followup care - I believe that 110%.  I could not have asked for a better surgeon.  He is frank and a straight shooter, but he cares about his patients and is simply laser focused on your health and outcome as his patient.  A Godly man who is devoted to his patients and gifted with a staff of doctors who guide you through giving you absolute confidence.  I am forever grateful and made a friend for life in Dr. Hadley.

name: J B
text: Dr. Hadley has performed surgery on both my husband and myself, more recently on myself.  I went from debilitating pain to pain free immediately after surgery.  Dr. Hadley is the BEST!!!  November 2020

name: John Smyth
text: Wife had back surgery. Great results. Wonderful staff. Pleasant to work with.

name: Barbie Knopp
text: Absolutely a great experience. From first visit, to surgery and everything in between. Can not thank Dr. Hadley,  Dr. David and the rest of their staff enough.

name: Janice Carnes
text:
For the past two years being a patient of Dr. Hadley I have received great medical care.  I have established a phenomenal rapport with Dr. Hadley and the entire staff before and after my recent medical procedure. I can’t express how consoling and reassuring Dr. Hadley made me feel. His explanation simplified the process and technique.  He responded to all my inquiries and concerns. Dr. Hadley went over and beyond the day of my medical procedure, he led prayer with my family and I. He even made a special effort visiting me during my hospital recovery period, each day including Sunday before he went to church. At whatever point I contacted his office with an inquiry regarding my procedure and medication my calls were answered promptly from Dr. Aldrich & Dr. Linda.

My genuine appreciation to Dr. Hadley and his staff

Janice Carnes
Montgomery, Alabama

name: Allen McCain
text: Terrific experience and 100% surgical success. Great staff.

name: Tiny Dancer
text:
I have had several spine surgeries, by well- known, even famous, Neurosurgeons. Dr. Hadley trumped them all in proficiency, professionalism, thoroughness, and caring. Everyone on his staff was wonderful.
Most importantly, my results were amazing! No matter the bedside manner, accolades and degrees a doctor has, the bottom line is results. My results were not only better than expected, my surgery fixed more than it was intended to.
I am forever grateful🙏🏻.

name: Tori Waters
text: I could not have asked for a better surgeon, better surgical team, or better care overall than was provided by Dr. Hadley & his team.  His skill is remarkable. I had complete confidence in his abilities, & he was so well regarded & highly recommended by everyone I talked to.  In addition to his surgical expertise, I wish I could put into words how kind, thorough, patient, encouraging, & responsive they were. It meant the world to me, & I pray blessings on each of them.

name: Greg Raymond
text: If we could give Dr. Mark Hadley more than five stars we would do so without reservation. Dr. Hadley's exemplary surgical skill restored my husband's quality of life and physical strength. His knowledge and expertise have allowed my husband to once again sleep through the night and be free from the considerable and constant pain he'd been in. The complicated and healing surgery he performed without any complications, the kindness he's showed us, and the truly heartfelt care that Dr. Hadley has provided are gifts we can only repay with our deepest gratitude and highest respect. Dr. Hadley always focused on us, listened to our concerns, explained results and films, and answered questions. Showing the highest level of respect for the health and well-being of his patients, Dr. Hadley will "tell it like it is" and advise the best options. My husband has been under Dr. Hadley's care for several years and in that time, he's received the finest and most respectful care, not just from Dr. Hadley, but his entire team, including David Aldrich, PA-C and Linda Davis, CRNP. During surgery, my husband was in the finest of hands. It is difficult to find the words to express how thankful and grateful we are for Dr. Hadley, his life-changing surgical talents, and his team who work tirelessly to help patients.

name: Jeff Andrews
text: What a wonderful doctor he is gave me hope of living a normal life after a different surgeon at a different hospital messed me up. Dr. Hadley got me straightened out I’m 12 weeks post operation and doing and feeling great better than I have had n a long time. This time last year I thought I was going to be in bad bad shape the rest of my life. So thank you doc. And your staff

name: Ed Nahass
text: I’m so glad I chose Dr Hadley to do my surgery . Very professional and caring.It’s been 7 months since my surgery and I’m feeling great. He has a great staff in Linda and Dave. Thanks again Dr. Hadley

text: I cannot say enough about the excellent care I received from Dr. Hadley and his team at The Kirklin Clinic.  Dr. Hadley personally called me to schedule my surgery, which I so desperately needed. My life had become fairly miserable because of severe back pain and just two weeks later, I am driving again, I can walk upright, and I can finally get back to work - all because of Dr. Hadley, Dr. Aldrich and all of the other doctors and nurses who cared for me at UAB.  I should also mention that Dr. Hadley operated on me 12 years ago, and I knew he was the only doctor I wanted to see this time as well.  Thank you, Dr. Hadley!!  You truly are the very best.

name: Rick Owens
text: Dr. Hadley and his staff are great. I feel as though I couldn't have been in better hands. Anterior cervical discectomy at C3-C4.

name: Jennifer Morris
text: I can’t say enough positive things about Dr. Hadley and his entire staff. I know without a doubt God led me to him. He and his staff genuinely care about their patients. His PA, David, is just amazing and his NP, Linda, is wonderful. I knew I was in the best hands and I know if I have further problems Dr. Hadley will take care of me!

text:
Dr. Hadley has preformed back surgery on both my wife and me. The outcomes both of us have experienced is nothing short of miraculous. I wouldn’t wish back fusion on anyone but if you must have it Dr. Hadley is the one you want to do it.

text: We have been blessed to have Dr Hadley and his staff take care of my family Dr. Hadley, David and Linda have always treated us like family. name: Shay Sutton
text: Dr. Hadley is an amazing surgeon. I had spinal fusion/decompression in Dec 2017. It is just a month after surgery and I already feel better and stronger than I have in years. He is an excellent doctor and person. He seems very caring. He took time to answer any questions and made me feel at ease even right before going into surgery.

name: David Riley
text: I had 9 spinal fusion surgeries and 12 years of Morphine. I met Mark while he was volunteering at the Birmingham VA. After a lot of diagnostics, Mark said he could help me. He absolutely did. I haven't felt better in 12 years. Most importantly, I am off morphine and all opiates. Mark is the best I've seen

name: Vulcan oz
text: The Doctor is simply the best Surgeon but beyond that he is a very good person. He was honest and also very supportive from the beginning to the end. He operated for Herniated Disk L5S1 surgery on me. I do not wake up with back pain anymore. My back pain is gone and physically I am improving every day. Doc's staff was very helpful and always tried to help me with any questions and concerns I had. Even to this day, I can call them and they will get back to me as soon as possible to make sure everything is going OK.

name: Curtis Loew
text: Dr Hadley shoots straight with you, but he also treats his patients the way he would want to be treated - including giving his patients contact info and returning calls in person when possible, which he did for me. AMAZING! It is so refreshing to have such a skilled physician also be so grounded and personable and be just as sure to address my wife's questions as he was mine. I went to sleep with weakness in all 4 limbs, and had an immediate improvement in strength even in recovery! Thank you, Dr Hadley - I hope I don't need your services again, but if anyone I know faces similar problems, I'm sending them your way!

name: Garrett Shaver
text: Dr. Hadley and his team are truly exceptional. I was very nervous about the prospect of having spine surgery and after meeting him I was confident I was in the right place. My surgery was a complete success and I could not be happier with the results.

name: Giant Slayer
text: I knew from the moment Dr. Hadley entered the room that I was going to be in good hands. Never have I had a doctor take the time to truly sit and explain my condition and to make sure I was comfortable with the decision to have surgery. I went into his office after 6 months of almost being crippled....and today, I know without a doubt that God used Dr. Hadley's hands and gift to heal my spine. I'm so thankful for his entire staff - they were kind, patient, thorough, and knowledgeable. I was given A+ care from the first office visit, to the day of my last check-up, and I/m certain Dr. Hadley will be there for me should I need any future spinal care.

name: Katheryn Jennings
text: I cannot begin to explain the impact that Dr. Hadley has made to my dad’s quality of life.  He effectively diagnosed his condition, did his surgery, and has been by our side during a difficult rehab phase.  We have depended on him and his team for guidance, advice, and support.  He is direct, honest and professional and demanding in regards to providing the best care possible.  If you want a physician to tell you what you would like to hear verses what you need to hear then he may not be your guy, however if you want effective and professional treatment I highly recommend him.

name: Jody Collins
text: Dr Hadley and his staff of caring professionals are dedicated to giving his patients the very best care . They are wonderful. I was constantly dropping things, numbness and tingling in my arms and legs. I’m now able to walk a straight line, carry things without dropping them . I’m actually enjoying my life again. His top nurse called me to make sure I was ok the next day after I was released. He and his staff get the highest stars I can give !! Thanks to them and their dedication to their patients I can live my life again. Thank you so much Dr Hadley.

name: Frazier Farm&Ranch LLC.
text: I first met Dr. Hadley in 2012. My family primary physician recommended Dr. Hadley that knew my complicated condition . I have C.I.D.P. ,I was diagnosed back in 2004, it was treated and came back 8 times in a 1 half year period. CIDP eats the coating off the nerves starting at the brain stem. Each time I would get treatment,  the coating would grow back, leave scar tissue. Getting back to my primary physician. Which is well known and one of the best. I had told him about my back pain for the last 5 years. I was on a lot of pain medication that I knew I couldn’t keep taking. So I asked him if he had a back surgery, who would he have perform it. He spoke with no hesitation. Dr. Mark Hadley is the only Dr. that will touch my back. He referred me to Dr. Hadley. Had to have a resent MRI taken. Sent it to Dr. Hadley. His staff contacted me promptly. Met Dr. Hadley soon after and was blown away by he’s professionalism and kindness. I never met another Dr. that showed me without a doubt how much he cared about my situation.I had spinal to-gnosis, I forgot to mention another neurosurgeon had told me 4 years prior. I needed fusion surgery because my vertebrates was out of line. That surgery would have wasted my time. Dr. Hadley trimmed out my spinal canal at L6 down into 5 that change my life. A 100 percent fix.                                                                                     This past year in 2019, I had to have a much more serious and complicated surgery. Disc slipped to one side sitting on my sciatic never. Had to have spinal wall built up on L5 and 4. Not to mention I was born with and extremely small spinal canal shaped like a triangle. Got my surgery in Dec. 3rd 2019. I wouldn’t let no other Dr. perform this surgery.God is working through Dr. Hadley’s hand in my opinion.

name: Alberta Williams
text:
I was so GRATEFUL that I was referred to Dr. Mark Hadley. I have always been afraid of surgeries because of prior surgical mishaps!!! Upon our first meeting, i knew that Dr. Hadley was an exception to my prior preconceived notion. He is a very knowledgeable, competent, courteous and a Professional doctor. After examining me and reviewing my records. He ordered some additional tests of his own so that every " t" was crossed and every "i" was dotted to ensure that I would be given the best treatment. He performed an ACDF surgery on me and I couldn't be more GRATEFUL!!!! Such a God Sent man that I will forever cherish. I am referring him to everyone that I know who is having spinal and/or back issues!!
Alberta Williams

name: Camille Whitman
text: My husband had a three month wait to see Dr. Hadley, but it was well worth it. Dr. Hadley is extremely intelligent, compassionate, caring person and a truly outstanding doctor. He took the time to explain my husband's diagnosis and tell us his opinion of what was the best action to help him. Honestly, what a wonderful thing to have a doctor who actually cares about your well-being, and takes the time to explain his thinking. We count ourselves truly blessed to have Dr. Hadley as my husbands doctor.

name: Lydell Williams
text: God know he blessed me when he sent me to Dr. Hadley. I had a previous surgery a year before my surgery by Dr. Hadley. That was the worst year I had in my life!!!! The main thing that I love about Dr. Hadley is that he makes it known that he is a tool for God's work. He is also very straight forward and that is another trait of his that I love. My first surgeon didn't give me the feeling I got, when I was in his office. His staff, OMG, are the best staff I have seen in my 40 years. From the start until now, they have been so helpful and caring. To me, that is very rare. I want to thank Dr. Hadley and his entire staff, because without them I would be in major pain. Now I can sit straight up and watch Major Payne, instead of being in Major Pain!!! Thank you Dr. Hadley and your entire staff and may God continue to bless all of you.

name: Kathryn Strickland
text: This man saved me 100%. He won’t rush to surgery but he will do what needs to be done. I am more than a decade out from major surgery by Hadley, and able to function like a normal human again.  I went from being in on a cane or wheelchair at 20 years old, to rock climbing at 30. Best Dr. around by far!

name: Bill Wootten
text:
Dr. Hadley engaged in 8 hour surgery on my lower lumbar 2 1/2 months ago. It was a difficult procedure and I am so pleased and pain free now, I felt compelled to write this review.
God Bless this talented Physician.

name: brandon givens
text: I had been dealing with  L5 S1 problems since 2012. Was told to deal with it as long as possible because a fusion was my only option. I can honestly say had I known about Dr. Hadley and his skillset in 2012, I would have had my fusion surgery in 2012.  So in October 2018 I had my fusion surgery performed by Dr. Hadley. One of the best decisions I have made, he gave me my life back.  I couldn't remember what it was like to live without back pain and now I cant believe I waited so long.  Very Professional, Very Courteous, always had time to answer any question I had for him. I will recommend him to anyone with spinal problems.

name: Augusta Hassinger
text: My husband has had neck pain for 5 plus years. It completely altered his lifestyle.  Dr. Hadley gave him the first bit of hope that he could live pain free. My husband woke up from the surgery feeling a thousand times better.  The pain he was experiencing was gone. Dr. Hadley is very knowledgeable and takes the time to explain and answer any questions you may have. I highly recommend Dr. Hadley and his team. They are very professional and friendly.

name: Christy Cofield
text: He done a great job on my husband he was up walking around after they put him in his room. I know God was guide Dr. Hadley hands he is a great surgeon. Thanks for everything you done for my husband and God bless you

name: Justin Bearden
text: Dr. Hadley provided the utmost care and information regarding my surgery.  Entering into the procedure I was well-informed and had confidence that the procedure would be performed by someone that not only knew what they were doing but also took pride in doing the best work.  I am very grateful to Dr. Hadley and his staff for making this as easy as possible.

name: Erica Haupert
text: Dr. Hadley is not only an amazing, wonderful man but is extremely skilled at what he does. I am grateful for my time with him and recovered perfectly from C4/5 fusion. I have sent numerous people to him and would highly recommend him to anyone needing his expertise!

name: Dudley Berry
text: Dr. Hadley and his staff are the BEST Dr.'s I've ever experienced! Having a 4 level fusion is scary and being in severe pain is too. Dr. Hadley was so kind, reassuring, very thorough and calming. He was truly awesome! I am no stranger to back surgery and I can say, Hands down, I will never go anywhere else. DR. MARK HADLEY is my Dr. from here on out, and that is refreshing knowing that he truly cares about my situation.

name: bryan pike
text: Awesome experience, and I would recommend Dr. Hadley to anyone!  Great bedside manners and speaks to you like he's known you forever.  No after surgery issues for me. I'd go back to him for anything.

name: Jonathan Eric Headley
text: If you have to be cut on beg for the best. I used Doctor Hadley at UAB. He is a professor as well. Really knows what he is doing. Puts your care ahead of even his own plans. Cancelled a flight to go out of town because I needed the surgery then. I was told by I group in Montgomery that they didn't want to touch me because of how bad I was. So if they know they aren't the best go to the best. All of his staff are wonderful. If I could give him a 💯 stars I would.

name: Vickie Pocius
text: Dr Hadley is a great doctor.  Very caring, attentive, informative and so glad he said I didn't need surgery.  A great asset to UAB.  ❤

name: Gray Vanderbilt
text: Arrogant narcissist with a staff that does care. He silenced me when I asked post surgery questions and didn’t believe me when I told him I was still in pain. His staff is good though. They try.

name: Hyung Kim
text: Dr. Hadley is an amazing doctor and a nice friend.  The first microdiscectomy was done in 2012 and it was like a miracle. I had suffered with L5S1 disc herniation for over 8 months, but when I wake up from the surgery, the pain was completely gone.  I have had no problem whatsoever for over 6 years, but I had recurrent L5S1 disc herniation 2 months ago. The second surgery was done 2 weeks ago and just like last time,  I am completely pain-free now and a happy camper again. I am so touched by his kindness, expertise, and his friendship.   I thank God for Dr. Hadley and I would like to recommend him to for anyone seeking sciatic pain relief and improving their quality of life.

name: Teresa Mann
text: Before finding Dr. Hadley, I was in constant pain.  I could only walk for exercise.  Six months after having an Anterior Cervical Disk Fusion, I am running 2 miles a day and walking 2 miles a day.  I am able to lift weights again and I have lost 25 pounds.  I am grateful to Dr. Hadley and his excellent team for giving me a life again.  Everyone I came into contact with from the first evaluation to the post op appointment was pleasant and professional.  I had to stay overnight at UAB and the service was first class.  It was truly the best experience I have ever had in a hospital setting.

name: Bethwes Walker
text: I would like to say how blessed I was to be treated by Dr. Hadley. He was always friendly and professional in taking care of me. Answered all my questions before and after surgery and made me feel at ease. My surgery was successful and I appreciate all he has done for me. I would recommend him to anyone who is having back problems to make an appointment with Dr. Hadley for an honest and professional opinion. If you do need surgery in my opinion you could not be in better hands.

name: Patsy Norenberg
text: My first visit with Dr, Hadley I must admit I found him a bit intimidating, however, his knowledge, skill, honesty and concern blew the feeling of intimidation away.  I knew I was seeing the best Doctor for my back problems.  The entire team at the UAB hospital, and Dr. Hadley's office staff were professional, kind and caring.  Well worth the drive from Pensacola to get the help I needed.  I would (and will) recommend Dr. Hadley to any friends or family.  Thank you so much Dr. Hadley.

name: Kristina Livingston
text:
Apparently the stigma of a bias dr. Is true. Dr. Hadley refused to see me because my BMI was too high. Never even laid eyes on me. He went soley off of what a piece of paper said. Not the medical need of two herniated discs.
I guess because your over weight due to lack of movement because your spinal fusion 2 years ago was a joke and your in more pain now than before the surgery Doesn't matter. But a Dr. Will help a healthy addict so they can receive more money to send them to a rehab, and treat you if you are skinny and pretty.
Great job doc. No worries you aren't alone. Apparently getting treatment outside of the U.S. maybe a better route.

name: bobby patterson
text: He was the most arrogant Dr. I have ever met. I was in so much neck and shoulder pain. He told me I needed to join a gym. Every time I tried to ask him a question, he told me if I'd be quiet, he'd answer my question. I have never felt so helpless and disgusted with a Dr visit. He told me the gym would make me feel better. He made me a return appointment. But he told he hoped i didn't come back. I will never recommend him to anyone. I went to Dr. Dorchak at Hughston Clinic. I had the best experience, and now I'm pain free.

name: Billymichael Warren
text: I had 4 previous surgeries on my neck C4 5 &6 after all of those I finally found Dr Hadley my pain was a 12 on a scale of 10 met with him my first impression of him,I felt like I had met general Patton so professional so confident I felt like hey this guy knows what the hell he is doing and thank the good lord he did felt like somebody was pulling my left arm off it took 2 surgeries  he fixed me eternally grateful

name: Lucienne Grimes-Gaa
text: Dr. Hadley is wonderful!  My son had pain, numbness, and tingling for 20 months.  Post op, all symptoms were relieved.  Dr. Hadley is also an exceptionally kind physician and explained everything in detail.  Highly recommend him to anyone with neck problems.

name: Debra Van Hoolandt
text: After 30 years of being in pain , many unsuccessful visits with military and VA doctors my husband is nearly pain free. Thank you Dr. Hadley for giving him his life back and enable us to be active again. Dr. Hadley is a God send.

name: Melissa Hilton
text: Dr Hadley changed my life for the better.  I'd had several back surgeries, 4 to be exact with the last one less than a year before I saw him for the first time.   I'd been in pain management for many years and started to feel like I'd be living in pain for the rest of my life.  I was in tears the day that I had my consultation with Dr. Hadley and he was so kind and compassionate. He assured me that he could help me and he kept his word.  I'm three months post surgery, a 4 level lumbar fusion, and other than still being a little sore and tight I feel like I have my life back.  Dr. Hadley is amazing and I thank God for him everyday.

name: Michael Gass
text: Dr. Hadley did my neck surgery back in 2006. Selecting Dr. Hadley was one of the best decisions I made for my Cervical Spinal Fusion. He's one of the top surgeons in his specialty.

name: Theresa Shackelford
text: I was in even worse pain after another neurosurgeon operated on L3. I had almost given up hope as 3 different neurologists and an orthopedic surgeon looked at the same pictures and saw nothing. Dr. H saw the issue immediately. He worked me in for surgery the following week. I woke up, and felt better than I had in almost 2 years. He gave me back my legs!

name: Jenny Skipworth
text: Dr Hadley is one of a kind! I had the most wonderful experience under his care... I had severe spinal stenosis with a L4L5 facet fracture. Dr Hadley diagnosed me my first visit with him and I had been struggling to get answers for months. He listened to me and talked with me ... he took time to know me . I was scheduled for surgery that day. He fixed me completely I have no pain.. I was dealing with severe pain everyday... he saved my life!

name: Brian Mrr
text: I was under the care of spine specialist in Florida.  In 3 visits,  i never even met to actual doctor.  In my first visit to Dr Hadley not only did i meet him,  but i received the type of exceptional care i had only heard about.  He is a very courteous professional and also a good man.  The entire visit made me change my opinion of Healthcare.  Not to mention,  he personally called me the next day for follow up.  Impressive stuff.

name: Megan Hovater
text: Dr. Hadley performed surgery on my mother originally around 2002 for Spinal Stenosis.   My mother was losing the feeling in both of her legs due to the narrowing of her spinal canal and Dr Hadley was able to relieve her of the pain and numbness she was experiencing.  Recently in 2017,  I took my mother back to see Dr Hadley because she was having a tingling sensation that started in her hip and ran all the way down to the top of her foot.  She was in constant pain and was unable to sit still for extended periods of time.  She never went anywhere and was never able to enjoy life because of the chronic pain she was experiencing.  Dr Hadley looked at her x-rays and felt confident he could give her relief from her pain by doing a fusion on her lower back (L2-L5).  My mother is 67 years old so I was nervous about her going under anesthesia but Dr Hadley assured me he wouldn't do anything to my mother he wouldn't do on a loved one of his own.  My mother went in for surgery on July 14th and had two rods and three screws put into her lower lumbar region of her back.  In a matter of days, she had relief from the pain she had been experiencing for years!  Today, she is 4 weeks out from her surgery, an inch and a half taller, and she is doing wonderful!  Dr Mark Hadley and Dr David Aldridge were incredibly nice and we are eternally grateful to both of them for their kindness and help!  We are so thankful that Dr Hadley chose to use his God-given talents to help people, such as my mother, feel better and to be able to have an active lifestyle!  Thanks again Dr Hadley for all your hard work! God Bless you and your wonderful staff!

name: Kimo Tedtaotao
text:
A gifted surgeon and a man of Faith & Excellence.  He came highly recommended by my neurologist!!!  I’d driven 6 hours to meet Dr. Hadley & was so impressed by his knowledge, expertise, credentials & His love for God to help people improve their quality of life.  I had suffered with neck and back pain for three years because of a near fatal head on collision from a drunk diver.   My life has changed for the best as a result of the ACDF surgery he performed on me July of this year. There is no more pain to my neck and back, no headaches, no weakness in my extremities and the constant tingling & numbing sensations.  I thank God for Dr. Hadley and he has my highest recommendation for anyone  seeking neck & back pain relief and improving their quality of life.

Dr. Tedtaotao

name: Tom Chandler
text: Dr. Hadley is caring, compassionate and the consummate professional. Highly skilled and sought after, waiting to be seen by him was the smartest medical decision I have ever made.

name: Glenn Ford
text: Dr. Hadley gives you individualized care, his time, and he is all about doing what is best for his patients. If your problems can be solved without surgery he is all about that. He is never in a rush, and he listens to what you have to say.

name: J Schleigh
text:
I was referred to Dr. Hadley by the neurosurgeon I've used on my last 3 surgeries for "a higher level of care." What a joke this turned out to be. The joke was on me however.
Dr. Hadley's staff was rude and uncaring when I called for a status on my appointment. The staff had all of my records to give Dr. Hadley for 3 weeks before giving them to him for review. I've been in constant, severe pain from a ruptured T12-L1 disc.
I called his office again this morning, August 21 2018. The doctor, at this point, has had my records since July 24, 2018. I was told that, "Dr. Hadley doesn't do that kind of back surgery anymore." I was dumbfounded. This guy is supposed to be one of the top 10 spine surgeons in America! Then I was told he had referred my case to a Dr. Okor on August 8, 2018! Really!?!? Two weeks ago!?! I never received a telephone call from his office to inform of his decision to NOT do my back surgery. His office hasn't even sent my records to Dr. Okor. Communications at this highly recommended surgeon's office is pathetic. The entire staff at Dr. Hadley's office is either inept and unqualified for their jobs or they just don't give a damn about people like me that are in constant, severe pain. If I could give a rating of 0, I would and they're not deserving of even a zero.

name: Nathan
text: After a motorcycle accident and being flown to UAB, I was told I would never walk again. Dr. Hadley performed my surgery and I'm thankful to say I'm not only walking but I am back working, performing normal activities with my family, and yes even riding again! Thank you Dr. Hadley for giving me back a normal life.

name: Wendy Sandusky
text: This Dr helped my mother! He is truly a great Dr and surgeon!

name: Peter Donohue
text: Dr Hadley performed surgery on my lower back over 20 years ago and I have not had a problem since. He really lived up to his billing even though he went to Stanford (LOL).

name: Lanny Ransum
text: Dr. Hadley is a great surgeon. I recommend him highly!!!!

name: paula wilson
text: Very informative!

name: Todd Addison
text: Did not correct my issue and was very stubborn about listening to what I was saying about it.  After his first surgery I still had same pain in my left hand.  I explained that I felt it was Golf related. I felt I had a broken hamate bone.. he was adamant about blowing me off.  After being released from him, I went to Andrew’s Orthopedic and they confirmed exactly what I thought.  My “Hook of the Hamate” was fractured. Now I’m having surgery to fix what was my issue. What a complete waste of my time he was!

name: Aaron Southern
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz for carpal tunnel syndrome. His staff was fantastic. They were able to get me an appointment right away. Dr. Bonatz took his time to make sure every question I had was answered. Their surgery coordinator was able to work me into their surgery schedule within the following week. After the surgery, I was back to work within 3 days, typing on a keyboard all day. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. I am currently scheduling my surgery with my other hand. Definitely check them out!

resp.text: Wow, we appreciate the high praise, Aaron! We're thankful you chose us to be a part of your recovery journey, and we'll be sure to pass along your kind words to everyone involved.

name: Jason Hall
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz by my orthopedic surgeon. She had told me that he was one of the best hand surgeons around. I will say that received great care and the surgery went well. Very pleased with the overall experience. He is the best.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Mr. Hall! We're thrilled that you had a great experience with our clinic.

text: Dr. Bonantz is rude, does not listen, and does not deal with the correct problems.  I went to him with a hand problem and he informed me I am an overweight diabetic,  which I already knew.  He sent his nurse in with papers for bariatric surgery across the hall.  I have a cyst in my hand I need removed.   I'm well aware of my weight problems.   I have to buy my clothes.  No thank you, you rude, self righteous know it all.  He also told me I would die without the covid vaccine,  and he's told multiple other people this.  I would not recommend this "doctor" to anyone. for anytbing

Please reach out to me at (205) 985-4111 or email me at mjones@slortho.com so we can better understand the problem and better serve our patients in the future.

name: Kimberli Calma
text: Dr. Bonatz and his staff are amazing! He is brilliant and he has surrounded himself with an amazing knowledgeable and caring team.  Their attentiveness and follow up is amazing and this comes from a patient with an emergency on a Friday that continued over the weekend into the following week.  They did not miss a beat ensuring I have a healthy full functioning hand.  Thank you Thank you!

name: candy j
text: Dr. Bonatz has to be one of the worst doctors I’ve ever seen. My first visit with him was Nov 6 fracture ring finger sprained middle finger. He had me to start Occupational Therapy immediately. My return visit with Dec 8. My range of motion had improved however the strengthening had not even begun. All of my OT were saying the same thing my hand needed further OT because of my job. On Dec 8 2020 Dr. Bonazt entered the room and began talking with the door of the room wide open. I asked if he could close the door while we discussed my injury. His response no because of COVID-19 a violation of my patients rights mind you Dr. Bonazt was not wearing a mask nor gloves so much for concerns. Also, while waiting on him the door was closed the entire time and anyone else that entered closed the door behind them. He ask me what my job title was twice which I’m sure was on my report. He indicated that the fracture was healing pretty good I didn’t need surgery and therefore there was nothing else he could do. I question him because I must be 100% my strength in my hand indicated that I could hold up to13lbs briefly. I asked him for copies of the report he denied me of that also, stating that workman’s comp would have to request it. Forgetting when I visit him the first time he did.  His sarcastic remarks and tone was very belittling. To add insult to injury as he was walking out he says if you break anything else come see me. Unbelievable and Rude he obviously doesn’t care because there’s no repercussions behind his actions.

name: Kaye Byrd
text: Dr. Bonanza and assistants were pleasant, explained procedures, and answered my questions fully.

name: Jane Carson
text: Office staff was very friendly and helpful . Dr Bonatz was on spot and Office was quick to setup the additional testing to verify my issues so that Dr Bonatz could resolve them. I learned about him from a friend w similar probs and she had excellent results. From everything so far,  I’m sure I will have the same excellent results.

name: Marilyn Seier
text: Excellent surgeon and has operated on both wrists and more recently my right hand. He thoroughly explains the diagnosis and the course of action to repair the problem. In case of an emergency like with my hand he saw me right away and planned surgery two days later. My Southlake physical therapist, Cathy, helped me rehab after all 3 surgeries and she is fantastic

name: Bobby Smith
text: Friendly, helpful,great staff, treat you like family.

name: Crystal Watford
text: Dr. Bonatz is professional, personable, and also quick, which I appreciate. He makes sure I understand what he has explained before leaving the room. He's done one surgery on my hand and is about to do another. I have no hesitations.

name: Ruth Black
text: He’s a sadistic man. Don’t go to him!  He hurts you & he allows you to be in excruciating pain after surgery. There are GREAT hand surgeons in Birmingham who have MANNERS and do not enjoy seeing their patients in pain.  One is Dr. Smith. He’s in the same office.

name: Beverly Kirkpatrick
text: Everyone was very friendly & professional. Dr. Bonatz was very thorough & explained everything concerning treatment for my problem. I would definitely recommend to others.

name: Candis Threatt
text: Dr. Bonatz is so straightforward but also very thorough. My son had a broken thumb that most times would require surgery, Dr. Bonatz simply had my son put in a cast and said, "Three weeks!" In exactly three weeks his thumb healed properly and he's back doing what he loves... Playing BASKETBALL! The supporting staff(front desk, nurses, pct, etc) were phenomenal!

name: Staci Rowell
text: Dr Bonatz is brilliant!  He is precise, professional and courteous. Would definitely recommend him to anyone needing hand/wrist treatment.

Dr. Bonatz is warm, kind and careful, double checking the info received from xrays, etc. Should you be in need of this type medical assistance, I highly recommend this clinic.

name: William Green

text: I don't have the knowledge to evaluate my visit based on the medical expertise of the people I saw, but I can talk about the efficiency of the office personnel, the personal respect from everyone I saw (both for patients and for each other), and the overall positive atmosphere there. First I can not say enough good things about the staff, they were extremely nice and compassionate. But Dr Ekkhard Bonatz is not, he has zero ethics. He told me he would preform surgery on my broken wrist but and I quote "it would not work anyway", DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!
I ask if I could see my break on an x-ray and he brought in a plastic arm, he patted my arm and thanked me because he could pay off his daughters college tuition with my injury. He acted like a pediatrician talking to a child. He refused pain treatment and said he would drink if it were him, again DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!

text: I would not send my worst enemy to this man. He lied about the procedure,  he lied about the treatment and was upset and told us that if we were to seek a second opinion he would no longer treat. He gave wrong meds when he had pathology report right in front of him . Not a compassionate person and neither is his assistant. Would NOT recommend.

name: Bo Canning
text:
Dr. Bonatz and staff are the most knowledgeable, caring team in Alabama. Dr. Bonatz took the time to answer all my questions during the process of rebuilding my hand. I never felt rushed by him.
His staff were the same way, taking time to discuss the questions you forgot to ask Dr. Bonatz. They are very knowledgeable and very caring.
His P.T. staff are the  and same way, they know their stuff, and are always encouraging you to do your exercises at home.  If you do what they say, you will improve your hand. (They are the best)
Lastly, the front desk and waiting room, in a word, excellent.

name: Chris Davis
text: Hands down one of the best doctors visits ever! Dr. Bonatz put me at ease with his knowledge, straight forward approached with a great dose of humor. His staff was friendly, quick and efficient and I feel like I received the best healthcare. I highly recommend Dr. Bonatz at Southlake Orthopedics

text: Dr Bonatz is least compassionate Dr I have ever had the misfortune to meet! He has no ethics whatsoever. He told my husband he would do surgery on his hand but it probably wouldn't work. He mentioned he needed the money for his daughter s college. He also said he would do the second surgery, he mentioned he wanted to go Spain. He also thanked my husband for fracturing his wrist. If you have hurt yourself and need treatment I wouldn't not recommend Dr. Bonatz. I would not take my dog to him. The staff however were very helpful and compassionate.

Very sorry you found your recent visit to be unsatisfactory to the standard you expected.  We are happy to coordinate a second opinion with one of our other Board Certified physicians if you so choose.  Our goal is to improve any conditions we can.

name: DEBRA SMITH
text: Dr. Bonatz and staff gave me excellent care before and after surgery. I couldn't have ask for better treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!

name: Juandelisha Perry
text: I am so greatful to have met Dr. Bonatz and the staff of Southland  orthopedic. For over 10+ years of  chronic pain I spent years searching for help and  consulting with my primay physican, rheumatologist,  neurologist, osteoarthritis, pain management, and any other specialist.   Unfortunately, they all gave up on me and past me on to the next specialist. Finally, I was referred to, I was Dr. Bonatz.  The frist cosultation, he knew what was wrong, schedule some tests and did not give up on me until he solved the problem.  For the first time in years, I can sleep at night with out pain, go outside during the winter with out pain. Thank you so much!!!

name: C Miller
text: I am due to have surgery with Dr. Bonatz  in the next couple of weeks. So I cannot speak of that experience yet. I can however speak of his Staff which has been wonderful, and informative, as has Dr. Bonatz. I would have given 5 stars except for the fact both times I have been to see him, once at Grandview, the other at the Southlake office, both times I had to wait 20 to 30 minutes past my appointment time. I realize they get busy, however  my time is important as well   My suggestion would be to find a way to improve upon that.  It’s a shame to have an appointment time of 1:15pm and not leave until 3:00.

name: Kassie Luster
text: We had a really good experience with Dr Bonatz. We were very pleased with the care we recieved. My 10 yr old broke her pinky finger and it went into her growth plate. He was very good with her and making the right decision for her care. She was in a custom splint made for just her size for 3 weeks. We went back and he was so nice. Said she was healing nicely. She really liked him alot and would recommend anyone else with smaller children to see him. Staff was really awesome as well. We had not longer than a five min wait time each time we went.

name: Ronald Barksdale
text: Awesome

text: The staff as well as Dr.  Streetman are very professional and thorough.  The office wait times are amazing.  My surgery process was not a long dreaded wait.  He got me in and scheduled fast.  He reassured me everything was going to be fine and it was.  He took great care of me during surgery and made sure to let me know if I have any issues to call him any time or any day.

name: Whisperinglion

text: had a problem with my hip, scheduled and appointment online on Saturday and was called on Monday by the office and in on Thursday. Going to Xray was the best experience ever and the equipment first class. All medical staff including the Doctors treated me amazingly and I felt valued. I hope I dont need to come back but can guarantee I will if I get injured again

name: CeCe Cole
text: Consult visit went smooth and straightforward.

name: Gail Bush
text: My first visit with Dr. McGough and was very pleased.

name: Steven Knott
text: I required surgery on my right shoulder in 2014. The doctor did a good job then, I thought,  yet now I'm having trouble with what was done. Specifically, the bicep was relocated and screwed into bone, and now it does not feel so secure and is painful. The result of a recent visit felt ambiguous at best. Another huge problem is with the some of the staff. It is now July 2017 and during a recent visit in June, I discovered outstanding co-pays when there should not have been. I was ushered around with whispers behind my back like I was a delinquent. When I found out and refuted the claims, I was told their system was new and my info was on the older system. How convenient! When trying to contact Andrews Sports Clinic, the person answering the front lines either does not listen and things have to be repeated numerous times or the person is sarcastic, rude, and condescending with the whole  "mean girl" attitude. Its not unusual to wait while the person guesses what you want and when you interrupt to tell them what you want, look out! I don't know if this is what you are willing to go through but I'm not anymore. Nothing is worth this.

text: Dr. Ortega is great!

name: Edmund Martinez
text: I am being attended by Dr Bilton and Nurse Sexton, Absolutely Amazing! I am getting ready for my last visit before scheduling my surgery and the have been nothing but supportive and positive throughout the process. They are basically saving my life, highly recommend!

name: Stephen Dedman
text: Dr. Matthews was an excellent surgeon and I would highly recommend him. He is very thorough and explained everything in detail. However the office staff including the office manager (Mike) are rude and incompetent. There is a problem with communication. I had to pay an extra fee of $30 to have a third party company fill out medical paperwork to be faxed to my employer and they were not timely in doing so. I had to call repeatedly to make them do their job. After several days of calling and leaving messages I finally got the needed paperwork sent over to my employer. They are very slow to take care of business. When I went back to the office for a follow up visit with Dr Matthews I had to wait over two hours because he was in surgery. The office could have informed me!  This office needs to have better communication with their patients and hire someone to do paperwork. Front receptionist needs to leave her personal phone at home or at least put it aside when there are patients at the window needing help. I hope this review helps others to understand that you will find great surgeons in a not so great office.

name: Joshua Montemayor
text: First & foremost Dr. Matthew's is a good Dr. & I would recommend HIM. He performed a surgery on me a while back and it went smoothly. Fast forward to present day & I'm having some issues with the same exact issue I had surgery on. I thought hey no problem I'll go see Dr. Matthew's again considering he performed my surgery & told me if I ever had any problems in the future with this issue to come see him. I call to make an appointment & they won't even see me! Lady on the phone says I need a "referral". Hello, I'm a patient of his & paid thousands of dollars and now I can't even schedule an appointment with him!? Wow, I guess it really is ALL ABOUT MONEY. Very disappointed, I hope Dr. Matthew's gets a chance to at least read this & see first hand how his patients are being treated. Thanks for caring about my well being, I appreciate your lack of empathy. Treat others how you would want them to treat your mother. Meanwhile I'll be sure to work on a "referral" just not to this Monopoly.

name: Gail Schmandt
text: Dr. Matthews is one of the best surgeons I have ever gone to. They're a great group of doctors there & I highly recommend them.

name: Alexandra Neal
text: This office doesn’t even deserve one star. The surgeons may be competent. But their office staff is not. Don’t bother making an appointment you can just walk in and get to see a doctor. Even before people who have appointments and have been waiting for over an hour. There is no respect for patients’ times or lives. This is such a disfunctional office and I recommend going anywhere but here if you can. Otherwise plan to spend the whole day here. Minimum 3 hour wait. They run around like chickens whose heads have been cut off. Worst doctors office I’ve ever had to go.

name: MIKAYLA FIGUEROA
text: Dr Hedden and the staff are amazing!! I had a wonderful experience. I drove from Mississippi for his services, was actually recommended by a friend. And I also, recommend a friend and went got a breast augmentation done a couple months after me!! They are the best in the business!! Heather, an out of state coordinator, was so helpful with all my questions. This was the first surgery I have ever had and it went smoothly!! I recovered quick and just had the best experience.

name: Blake Thomas
text: Dr Hedden and his staff are the best in the business! He always takes time to listen to my goals and then explains to me how we can best accomplish my goals. I have always trusted his recommendations and without it my results would not have been satisfactory. Dr Hedden has done a breast augmentation, liposuction, and a tummy tuck on me over the years. Those surgeries boosted my confidence and motivated me to continue improving my body by eating healthier and working out. After I lost about 20lbs, I went back for a breast implant exchange. I’m 3 weeks post op. Never even required a pain pill. I look and feel so much better! Every experience has been flawless. I’ve sent 30+ friends who also love their results. If you are thinking about plastic surgery do it for yourself and go see Dr Hedden!

name: Corissa Lapsley
text: Dr. Hedden and his staff are freaking amazing. I have had the best experience with them since day one. I had a virtual consult and he answered every question and helped me decide what was best. I was able to schedule an appointment so fast. I had my in person consult on 5-14 and he was very attentive, knowledgeable and sweet, couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon. I had surgery for breast augmentation 5-28 and I’m 1 day post op. Surgery was a breeze and pain the same day was a little high which is expected but nothing compared to my c-section. I only took 2 pain pills yesterday. This morning there is some pressure on top but pain is bearable. I love my new breast. All of his staff was nothing but friendly and amazing. I honestly couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon or staff.

name: Kelly Stewart
text: Dr. Hedden and his entire staff are truly awesome!  My experience from the initial consultation to the follow up visits were extremely positive.  Dr. Hedden himself is very professional but very personable as well.  He took time with me answering all my many questions. I could tell he really cares about his patients.  His staff was wonderful as well!

name: Desiree Steiner
text: Had the absolute best experience with Hedden and Gunn. Heather who is the out of town coordinator helped me through the entire process. Traveled from Colorado to have my procedure done. Doctors and nurses were amazing and made me feel very comfortable. I am a week post-op and am able to raise my arms and lift my baby. Obsessed with the results already. Thank You!

name: Magan Quint
text: Very pleased with Dr. Hedden and staff. They make you feel comfortable and informed about all aspects of surgery.  Their customers service exceeded our expectations!!

name: Jessica Guinn
text: I recently used Hedden Plastic Surgery for breast enhancement surgery. My doctor was Dr. Hedden, himself. I specifically chose him for this surgery because he was my surgeon in 2007, when he performed a full abdomenoplasty. I was very happy with the results. I was five years out of gastric bypass at the time & I had lost 110lbs. My weight then was 155. My weight now is 162. So, I have kept the weight off. Dr. Hedden's skills have made me more confident and proportional. He's a great listener and an extremely talented surgeon. I've had zero complications. Dr. Hedden AND his wonderful staff have always EXCEEDED my expectations❤

name: Madisyn Hirsch
text: I have had the BEST experience with Hedden and Gunn plastic surgery! The staff is AMAZING, they have answered all my questions and have made me feel so comfortable and confident that I am making the right decision! I can not wait for my BA!

name: Adriane Lowe
text: I am currently on my 4th day of recovery. I traveled from Atlanta to Birmingham for the Hedden experience. I received 445cc Silicon and they are beautiful! You would think I've been had them. I had to be alone for surgery due to Covid. Dr.Hedden and his staff gave me extra attention and was very patient with me. I highly recommend him. Thank you Dr. Hedden for my new confidence!

name: Google user
text: I should have trusted my gut and never came back or booked surgery here. Dr. Hedden came off as very judgmental, lacked any bedside manner and completely botched my procedure. I got liposuction on a few trouble areas and I was left with large dips and large brown scars at every single place he cut. The scars look like very large, dark moles. It’s been 5 years and they are still there, hardly faded at all. Please avoid him for any type of liposuction procedures. I can’t speak to his work on other types of procedures since I did not get anything else. Best of luck, trust your intuition, and only go with doctors that don’t make your alarm bells go off. Severely regret this mutilation to my body and waste of thousands of dollars.

name: Amber Waters
text: I had my implants on top of the muscle with doctor Gunn and he did an amazing job I am so happy I was able to pick up my babies The day of surgery able to raise my arms I didn't miss any days of work my surgery on Friday and I went back to work on a Sunday night Make sure that your happy and Explain everything I couldn't be more happy with results Such a blessed recovery such an amazing job by everybody very personable makes you feel very comfortable I couldn't imagine a better experience 😀

I am so happy with the results already and I'm only 21 days post opt. They explained everything really well, I feel great, and my breast looked soooo good. I can't wait for March when Dr. Hedden does my tummy tuck.

text: It’s only been a week since my breast augmentation (500 cc silicone) and I’m already so happy with the results!! Dr Hedden did an amazing job and all of the staff is super friendly!! If you’re debating on where to go for your surgery, choose this place! Highly recommend!!

text: Dr. Hedden and the staff are amazing! Very professional. He made me very comfortable while also being very informative. text: Dr. Hedden and the entire staff were great. I have used this surgery center a few times and I personally wouldn't use anyone else, was so impressed with his work and staff that I had family come from Iowa and Georgia to use him as well and  I will continue to advocate on his behalf! :)

name: Katelyn Agee
text:
I was initially scared to travel nearly 5 hours from home for my breast augmentation, but after speaking to the out of town coordinator, Heather, my mind was at ease. I spoke to several of Dr. Hedden’s staff before I even went to see them in person! Everyone was so friendly and informative. They took their time explaining everything to me and helping me make the best decision for my augmentation! Not to mention, the price was unbeatable!
The day of surgery was great. Everyone was very friendly, I was inside at exactly the time they said I would be and going back for surgery not long afterwards! They even sent me this super cute “get well soon” card!
The whole facility was clean and very well kept, I felt comfortable being there during the Covid-19 Pandemic and did not worry about cleanliness one bit!

By far, outstanding! I will absolutely recommend Dr. Hedden and his staff to ANYONE looking for a great surgeon!

name: Leslie Hughes
